parameters.name: ApiDefault
parameters.description: The default throttling value for each API.

parameters.name: AppDefault
parameters.description: The default throttling value for each app.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the throttling policy.

parameters.name: SecurityToken
parameters.description: The security token included in the WebSocket request header. The system uses this token to authenticate the request.

parameters.name: TrafficControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the throttling policy.

parameters.name: TrafficControlName
parameters.description: The throttling policy name. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). It cannot start with an underscore.

parameters.name: TrafficControlUnit
parameters.description:
The unit to be used in the throttling policy. Valid values:

*   **SECOND**
*   **MINUTE**
*   **HOUR**
*   **DAY**

parameters.name: UserDefault
parameters.description: The default throttling value for each user.
